attributes.action: Take more notice of sexual trafficking in the UK
attributes.background: We are a year 11 citizenship group and we're doing our controlled assessment around the topic of sexual trafficking. After recent events around the world, we feel like our government doesn't take enough action to stop sex rings (for example the Rotherham sex ring) and we want this to change now.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle sexual trafficking.
